about_the_game:
The word-based, multiplayer, party game that doesn't require internet! 😺🎲 Play with your friends on different devices; you can play together in the same room or communicate using VoIP! The game features endlessly generating, live rounds that have different topics, modifiers, and letters!

How to play

  • Give an answer for each topic that begins with the letter shown on the dice 🎲
  • Score bonus points for alliteration 🐍
  • Watch out for Modifiers! 👀 They could double your points for a question or restrict what letters your answer starts with 🔤
  • If you are playing with friends 👩🏼‍🤝‍🧑🏽, your answer for a question must be unique within the room. If two players have the same answer, you both score 0 points 🙉
  • When marking your answers, the group decides what is marked correct ✅
  • There is 3 minutes on the clock! 🕒 Get your answers in fast 🏃‍♂️

Key Features

  • There are millions of possible rounds 📈 The game uses procedural generation, so every round is different!
  • No internet connection required! 📶 Everyone in the world 🌍 plays the same round at the same time even if their phone 📱 is offline!
  • Style your app 🎨 There are dozens of theme color combos available!

All Features

  • Singleplayer - play solo
  • Multiplayer - play with friends in the same room or around the world using VoIP. You can play Catlists with friends using different devices.
  • Custom Games - choose from topic packs or favorite rounds
  • Round History - your previous rounds are saved
  • Themes - dozens of theme colors and combos

name: Catlists

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, version 1809 (build 17763) or later.
  • Processor: x64 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The word-based, multiplayer, party game that doesn't require internet! 😺🎲
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
